entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, July 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, July 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 56 new Photos were uploaded to 14 Pūjas as follows (16 high resolutions, 33 medium resolutions, and 7 low resolutions).
(i) 1913-0000 Pūjā (creamish sāṛī with red flowers, white garland, flowers on wrists and ankles and at the back of the head, curtain, red covering sāṛī): 1 high resolution uploaded, link TBD 1913.
(ii) 1977-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1977.
(iii) 1978-0721 Guru Pūjā: 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link UK 1978.
(iv) 1979-0114 Makar Saṅkrānti Pūjā: 3 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1979.
(v) 1979-1202 Guru Pūjā: 2 high resolutions, 24 medium resolutions and 4 low resolutions uploaded, link UK 1979.
(vi) 1980-1231 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 1 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1980.
(vii) 1982-0704 Guru Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link UK 1982.
(viii) 1982-0801 Śhrī Ādi Śhakti Pūjā: 1 medium uploaded, link UK 1982.
(ix) 1986-0518 Śhrī Devī Pūjā: 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link France 1986.
(x) 1987-0816 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link France 1987.
(xi) 1989-1219 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1989.
(xii) 1989-1221 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1989.
(xiii) 1992-0510 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 4 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1992.
(xiv) 1992-1224 Christmas Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1992.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
